description:
Twin blade disposable razor
The Schick® Exacta 2 for Women® Sensitive razor provides an easy shave to leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. These disposable razors for women feature a conditioning strip formulated with Aloe and Vitamin E to provide glide and help reduce irritation and a comfortable rubber grip handle for stability. For convenience, push clean button allows for easy rinsing.

Disposable and small for portability and perfect for women on the go! The Exacta 2 is the perfect size for travel, the gym, the beach, or to keep on hand for quick touch-ups.
name: Schick Womens Razor Exacta 2 5 Pack
